text.div:
Pneumocystis Jiroveci Pneumonia (PCP) Prophylaxis

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm
    Code Display
    142118 Sulfamethoxazole 100 MG / Trimethoprim 20 MG Oral Tablet
    197557 Dapsone 100 MG Oral Tablet
    197558 Dapsone 25 MG Oral Tablet
    198334 Sulfamethoxazole 400 MG / Trimethoprim 80 MG Oral Tablet
    198335 Sulfamethoxazole 800 MG / Trimethoprim 160 MG Oral Tablet
    308429 Atovaquone 150 MG/ML Oral Suspension
    313134 Sulfamethoxazole 40 MG/ML / Trimethoprim 8 MG/ML Oral Suspension
    313137 Sulfamethoxazole 80 MG/ML / Trimethoprim 16 MG/ML Injectable Solution
    607295 Dapsone 0.05 MG/MG Topical Gel
    861597 Pentamidine Isethionate 50 MG/ML Inhalation Solution
    861601 Pentamidine Isethionate 300 MG Injection
